summary: User timeline_27 chronicles struggles with OCD and anxiety, showing gradual improvement with therapy.

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. Nothing will ever get better My performance has been terrible. I stopped taking my medication Met with HR about accommodations. called the crisis hotline They're being supportive. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I'll never get better. Everyone would be better off without me All this therapy for nothing. I'm losing my mind My therapist reminded me how far I've come. took my medication as prescribed Looking at my progress journal from six months ago. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I don't deserve to be loved. I'm a burden to everyone I stopped taking my medication My partner has been incredibly supportive. reached out for help Learning to accept help and love. I deserve to get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I want to give up on everything Back to square one. I haven't showered in a week Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. asked for support Reaching out for support instead of giving up. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I deserve to suffer Back to square one. I gave up trying Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. asked for support Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I'm not giving up
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The constant worry is exhausting. I feel empty inside I can't focus on anything. I've been drinking to cope My therapist recommended meditation so I tried a new coping mechanism and I deserve to get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel so alone. I feel empty inside Nobody understands what I'm going through. I stopped taking my medication Decided to join a support group. called the crisis hotline Met some people who actually get it. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The urges to self-harm are strong. I feel completely hopeless I can't get out of bed anymore Using the distraction techniques I learned. took my medication as prescribed Reached out to my crisis support instead. I'm building a support system
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Can't even do basic tasks today. I'm tired of existing I'm losing my mind Managed to shower and eat breakfast. called the crisis hotline Small steps are still steps forward. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I'll never get better. Everyone would be better off without me All this therapy for nothing. I'm spiraling out of control My therapist reminded me how far I've come. used my DBT skills Looking at my progress journal from six months ago. I'm being patient with myself
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me

posts.text: I feel so alone. I have no reason to keep going Nobody understands what I'm going through. I isolated myself from all my friends Decided to join a support group. went for a walk to clear my head Met some people who actually get it. I'm worth the effort
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. Life is meaningless I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I can't see a future for myself Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. set healthy boundaries Taking a mental health day tomorrow. Things can get better
maladaptive_evidence: I can't see a future for myself
